description.lang: Smart Switch is a Z-Wave Switch module specifically used to enable Z-Wave command and control (on/off) of any connected device such as bulbs.
Z-Wave Plus LifelineSmart Switch will send basic report to the associated nodes whenever it is turned on or off

name.lang: Setting device status after power failure

description.lang: Define how the Smart Switch reacts after the power supply is back on.
Smart Switch memorizes its state after a power failure
Smart Switch will be on after the power supply is reconnected.
Smart Switch will be off after the power supply is reconnected.
Smart Switch can send notifications to association device (Group Lifeline) when state of Smart Switchs load is changed.
Send Basic report only when Load condition is not changed by Z-WAVE Command.
After Smart Switch being included into a Z-Wave network, the LED in the device will indicator the state of load.
The LED will follow the status (on/off) of its load.
When the state of Smart Switchs load changed, The LED will follow the status (on/off) of its load, but the red LED will turn off after 5 seconds if there is no more switch action.
